short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help keep your chrome tabs in control

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free tool to: 

* Deduplicate your tabs (closes Chrome tabs that are duplicates in your browser window)
* Remove tab windows that have not been opened since a time you specify. 

I created this to solve my own itch. I usually have too many tabs open and I never close my old tabs. This tool helps me keep my Chrome organized. 

Use cases:
1. If you have a ton of the same tabs open, like reddit.com, then it will remove all but one tab.
2. Close all tabs that have not been opened in 2 hours (or any time you specify). 

I hope you enjoy! If you have problems or feature request, feel free to reach out. I'm happy to help solve this problem for others! 

You can view the open source code here: https://github.com/jchiare/tab-manager
